contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Quaregnon |picture=Quaregnon JPG03.jpg |picture-legend= |map=QuaregnonLocation.png |map-legend=Location of Quaregnon in Hainaut |arms= |flag=Quaregnon_Belgium.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Mons|Mons]] |nis=53065 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Guy Roland |majority=[[Socialist Party (francophone Belgium)|PS]] |postal-codes=7390 |telephone-area=065 |web=[http://www.quaregnon.be/ www.quaregnon.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=26 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=51 }} '''Quaregnon''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. On January 1, 2006 Quaregnon had a total population of 18,744. The total area is 11.08 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 1,692 inhabitants per km². == See also == * [[Charter of Quaregnon]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Hainaut}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]] {{Hainaut-geo-stub}}
